properties.name: lastfm2spotify.spotify-ms.web.accepted-origin-host
properties.description: Host for which requests may be handled by the application (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing).

properties.name: lastfm2spotify.api.spotify.auth.access.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of Spotify authorization access API (see: https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization-guide/#authorization-code-flow).
